title: Introducing: Shinies
body:
Not for the first time this year, I’ve intended to write an article about a relatively obscure new act, and a quick Google search reveals that their only coverage so far has been on [Lost Lost Lost](http://www.lostlostlost.com/2011/12/shinies-spent-youth.html) via the ever-present King of vibes **Matt Britton**. Hailing from Manchester, **Shinies** debut track _Spent Youth_ is a gritty number, neither exploding into life nor settling for merely trundling along; landing somewhere in the middle, as an intriguing splutter. As Matt pointed out, there’s little information on **Shinies** so far, aside from _Youth Spent_, an image of a topless woman on a playing card, and a band title that (I hope) is a reference to Panini stickers, and let’s face it, everyone loved a shiny.

 [Spent Youth](http://soundcloud.com/shinies/spent-youth) by [Shinies](http://soundcloud.com/shinies)
